title: Is it weird to love all kinds of music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly I think it’s strange to only be into one genre of music. I love a lot of music myself. I’m not really into rap or most operas but I do enjoy some classical. I’ve always listened to a wide range of music, rock, blues, jazz, country (I prefer older country), pop (I usually prefer older pop too) and rockabilly are my most common mixes I listen to but I throw in other things too as the mood hits me and there’s music I like that I don’t really know how to put in any genre. There’s so many great songwriters, musicians and bands out there it seems like a waste not to give them a listen and appreciate the talent they have. I think it’s weird NOT to like all kinds of music personally.
